title: Calendar notifications in Ambient Display and "At a Glance" gone
content:
Hi all,
Pixel 5, Androind 11, Outlook and G Calendars.  Had to reset whole phone due to sensors going down.  On reinstall no calendar alerts on "At a Glance" or Ambient dsiplay - they were there before.  I have been through preferences and ambient display settings. Ask Google Help who asked me to ask you.
So any bright ideas?
Many thanks in advance
Marcus
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
